review: Good interaction with the doctor. She recommended carrying out a lengthy assessment before provide a course of action to further develop focus and self confidence in my child. Also gave some general tips to follow during our day to day interaction with our child. Feeling quite positive post consultation with her. The assessment is only done at CCDD, Malleswaram and takes about 5-6 hrs by trained psychologists.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Thanks Indeed for Practo and in particular Dr Nandini in reviewing the steps taken for my sons neurological problems .
I hope for further support in his continuous treatment by practo .
Best Regards 
Asiff.A.M

While Dr Nandini is very senior the way she talks and treats patients ** ** ** **** *** **** **** ****** *** *** ** *** **** *** ** ********* *** *** ***** *** ******** ** ** *** ** **** No patience at all. Very demotivating talks. **** ****** **** **** * ****** ******** **** **** ***** **** ***** ******** Don't even care to check the facts.*** *************** ** ***** ** *** ********* *** ******* **** *** ** ****** * * **** *** **** When we ask a few questions she feels offended or like we are doubting her skills. ***** **** **** * ***** ** * **** She is not bothered even if the kid is crying. *** *** * ****** ** ***** ***** *** ** ****** **** **** ** *** ***** ** ** **** *** ***** ** ******* *** ******* Never recommend her to anyone** **** **** **** *** **** *** ******* ********** *** ******* ****** *** ******* **** ** *** **** **** ** *** ****** ****** *** ******* *** *** ******* ******* I*** **** *** ******** **** **** *** ******** **** Apparently we have to adjust the timings of the baby according to their schedule. Dr Merin asked us to change the sleep pattern of the baby for her convenience and schedule.

It was least useful. All i got was a website to assess my baby's development on my own and a YouTube link on how to take of my preterm baby. Very de-motivating talks,  she just spoke to me for 2 or 3 minutes and was in hurry.
Consultation was high, yet no proper information provided by her. Wouldn't get back to her ever!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Professional, respectful and proactive in finding sustainable solutions for the well being of the child.
The doctor spend enough time to discuss the problem and various other things. Very responsive over mail also.
As per my experience with her... She has no patience to explain things. De Motivation talk to parents who are already worried .  No positive vibe

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Nice and a friendly doctor. She is very helpfull with respect and kind hearted. We will introduce her to the related cases
